PAYMENTPayment via Paypal is required for all auctions. Paypal accepts all major credit cards, as well as bank transfers. Payment is required within 5 days of auction close or item may be relisted. If you need more time to pay, please contact us to make an arrangement before buying. I am easy to work with. SHIPPINGItems will be shipped using the methods stated in the auction for the price stated in the auction. You may need to use the shipping calculator to get your actual shipping cost for some items. If you have special requirements, contact us before bidding. We are typically able to accommodate most requests. International buyers are more than welcome; I ship to many countries internationally. While not typical, packages can occasionally take up to four weeks or longer to clear customs. This is in addition to the times listed below. We ship items promptly, but have no control over the delivery time once the item is shipped.First Class Mail: This is a low-cost option for buyers who do not need speedy delivery. The delivery usually occurs within 1-3 weeks, it may take longer on occasion. For most countries I ship to, this will include tracking information. TERMS OF SALEAll sales qualify for the return policy specified above. Remember: All items are guaranteed to be 100% authentic. I accept returns for up to 30 days for any or no reason at all. CONTACT USPlease direct all correspondence through the eBay messaging system using the 'ask seller a question' link at the bottom of the auction. If there is any issue with your item, please contact us using the "Other" tab and NOT the "Item not as described" tab because this will open up a case automatically and that will not be necessary to work things out.
